Author: jaggederest
Title: Sunk Costs: Irrational decisions in Project Management

Author: jaggederest
Content: DHH was a PHP dev before he built Rails. Go read his blog. It's not surprising that some of their stuff is still in PHP.

Author: keiretsu

Author: zach
Content: Which suggests to me that you have to start desperate with a purely social site.  You have to, have to, have to reach a critical mass or you're boned.  Free stuff or promises of it, guerilla PR, outright paying users, spam-like invitations -- whatever it takes, you need to consider it.
